Career Profile

Odoo ERP Consultant and Technical Lead with 11+ years of experience delivering end-to-end ERP solutions using Python and the Odoo ecosystem. Proven expertise across Odoo versions v7 through v19, including solution design, custom module development, and production-grade implementations.

Strong capability in Odoo ORM, business workflows, and web framework development, with hands-on experience in third-party integrations, performance optimization, and system stability. Proficient in Python, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, Git-based workflows, and Linux administration.

Led and delivered solutions such as EKOR (travel management application) and HRstation (HR platform for a large conglomerate), and supported complex ERP operations including Fraîche Cancan ERP (formerly i-lunch). Focused on practical problem-solving, stakeholder alignment, and building scalable solutions that improve business efficiency.
